item.description:
SATURDAY, December 31st, 2011 Chamak Challo NYE 2012 Party -Our first kid friendly family event/dance party!

Come with friends!! Ready to dance and party!!

Biggest end of the year party of 2011 Ticket price includes buffet (9pm to 11pm)!

Early Bird Specials now! Kids under 6 are FREE!

Music/ Masti/ Food & Dance with Family. Starting at $25 Onlly

Tix at www.Generationdesi.com

WHEN:Saturday,April 2nd, 2011

WHERE: Cafe of India - 52 Brattle St,Cambridge, MA - Right in downtown Boston!

TIME: Doors open at 9:00pm. Party goes till 2:00 AM! Please arrive early! Plenty off Street parking & validated parking lot right opposite. MBTA Chinatown Stop All our events sell out! Dont miss it!! Limited Space!

Tix at www.Generationdesi.com
item.name: Chamak Challo NYE 2012 Party -Our first kid friendly family event/dance party!
